availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Francis N. Alexander (Captain in the 1st Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment)

body.p: Wayne County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza Ann Roberts Alexander. Farmer in Wayne County in 1860. Household owned four enslaved persons in Wayne County in 1860. Served in the 1st Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as captain from July 1, 1861, to April 14, 1863. Served in the 30th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as colonel from April 5, 1864, to April 18, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 28-29.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 286-287. 906.
